subject: Manual updated greyed out
description_text:
Hello, I have older simsonn pro pedals with that old control box with no
reset button. I read that it's still possible to update firmware by doing
manual update, but that button is not clickable for me. I tried different
versions of Simsonn manager software, logging in updating to latest
firmware. But still that manual update button is not available. How to make
it available?

conversations.body_text: Hi Nerijus Navikas,    May I ask when you purchased it? Also, could you please confirm whether the version number shown in the old software is 1.7.1?

I purchased my pedals in beggining of  march 2024. If i understand
correctly it says firmware 1703.

Once i had issues with pedal and had to reflash firmware through freejoy,
so if I remember correctly you then sent me 1.7.0 version. Is it necessary
to update to 1.7.1 to get manual updates available? Can i flash firmware
using freejoy to 1.7.1 then?

>

Hi Nerijus Navikas,    Version 1.7.0 cannot be upgraded directly to 1.7.1 and is not compatible with the latest Simsonn Manager for now.  Could you please let me know what specific issue you are currently experiencing?  I can send you a recovery file tomorrow to restore your pedal settings.  If the settings are corrupted or the pedals are not functioning properly, this file should help resolve the issue.

I have no issues. Just wanted to update software so i could use new simsonn
manager, But if it is not supported then no other issues i have.


On Sun, Oct 26, 2025 at 4:43â€¯PM service@simsonn.com

Hi Nerijus Navikas,    Yes, the earliest version does not support updates, so it cannot be upgraded.  If you need vibration functionality, you can purchase the latest control box from the official website,  which supports the latest software and vibration feedback.  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-vam-pedals-haptic-reactor?variant=51351053533498
